ideas.title: SNAP Work Requirement Reinstatement and Employment Outcomes
ideas.rationale: Strong DiD design with staggered waiver reinstatement, accessible Census ACS data, policy-relevant question about safety net work requirements

ideas.title: SNAP Work Requirements and Labor Force Participation by Age Group
ideas.rationale: Valuable extension but derivative of Idea 1

ideas.title: SNAP Work Requirements and Self-Employment
ideas.rationale: Underpowered due to low base rate of self-employment
